text.jpText: ヒシアマゾンは素晴らしい走りを見せた！
text.enText: Hsi Amazon had a great run!

text.jpText:
ヒシアマゾンはまずまずの結果を残す。
今後への期待が高まる走りだった。
text.enText:
Hsiamazon achieved a decent result. The race 
raised expectations for the future.

text.jpText:
しかしナリタブライアンは不調のまま。人々
の期待も薄れていく。ヒシアマゾンは自分に
出来るのは高みで彼女を待つことだと考える。
text.enText:
However, NARITABURAI remains in a slump. 
People's expectations for her were fading. 
Hsi Amazon thinks that all she can do is to 
wait for her Hsiaramaison thinks that all she 
can do is to wait for her at the top.

text.jpText:
『ジャパンカップ』前のインタビューで
ヒシアマゾンははっきりと言う。ライバルは
以前と変わらず、ナリタブライアンだと――
text.enText:
In an interview before the "Japan Cup," 
Hsiamazon was very clear. HCM's rival is is 
still the same as before, Naritabryan.

text.jpText:
ヒシアマゾンはナリタブライアンの復活を
信じていた。そんな彼女の言葉を受けて、
世間の持つ印象も少し変わったようだ……！
text.enText:
Hsiamazon believed in the resurrection of 
Naritabu Ryan. With her words like that, the 
The impression the public has of her seems to 
have changed a bit: ……!
